item.title: KuCoin to pay nearly $300 million in penalties after guilty plea
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: KuCoin's operator, PEKEN Global Limited, pleaded guilty to operating an unlicensed money-transmitting business and agreed to pay $297 million in penalties to settle charges in the U.S. [...]

item.title: Backdoor found in two healthcare patient monitors, linked to IP in China
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: The US Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) is warning that Contec CMS8000 devices, a widely used healthcare patient monitoring device, include a backdoor that quietly sends patient data to a remote IP address and downloads and executes files on the device. [...]

item.title: Google blocked 2.36 million risky Android apps from Play Store in 2024
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Google blocked 2.3 million Android app submissions to the Play Store in 2024 due to violations of its policies that made them potentially risky for users. [...]

item.title: Ransomware attack disrupts New York blood donation giant
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​The New York Blood Center (NYBC), one of the world's largest independent blood collection and distribution organizations, says a Sunday ransomware attack forced it to reschedule some appointments. [...]

item.title: DeepSeek exposes database with over 1 million chat records
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: DeepSeek, the Chinese AI startup known for its DeepSeek-R1 LLM model, has publicly exposed two databases containing sensitive user and operational information. [...]

item.title: The Advantages of Cloud-Based Remote Desktop versus RDP over VPN
item.dc:creator: Sponsored by TruGrid
item.description: Remote work is now an essential part of many businesses, requiring organizations to rethink how they provide secure and efficient access to corporate resources. Learn from TruGrid about the advantages of cloud-based RDP versus RDP over VPN, especially in the context of security, performance, and cost-effectiveness. [...]

item.title: Major GitHub outage affects pull requests and other services
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​GitHub is mitigating an ongoing incident causing problems with multiple services, including performing pull requests, creating or viewing issues, and even viewing repositories and commits. [...]

item.title: New Syncjacking attack hijacks devices using Chrome extensions
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A new attack called 'Browser Syncjacking' demonstrates the possibility of using a seemingly benign Chrome extension to take over a victim's device through the browser. [...]

item.title: Microsoft lifts Windows 11 update block for PCs with gaming issues
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft has removed a safeguard hold that prevented devices with Auto HDR enabled from installing the Windows 11 2024 Update due to gaming issues. [...]

item.title: Police seizes Cracked and Nulled hacking forum servers, arrests suspects
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Europol and German law enforcement confirmed the arrest of two suspects and the seizure of 17 servers in Operation Talent, which took down Cracked and Nulled, two of the largest hacking forums with over 10 million users. [...]

item.title: Time Bandit ChatGPT jailbreak bypasses safeguards on sensitive topics
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: A ChatGPT jailbreak flaw, dubbed "Time Bandit," allows you to bypass OpenAI's safety guidelines when asking for detailed instructions on sensitive topics, including the creation of weapons, information on nuclear topics, and malware creation. [...]

item.title: New Aquabotv3 botnet malware targets Mitel command injection flaw
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A new variant of the Mirai-based botnet malware Aquabot has been observed actively exploiting CVE-2024-41710, a command injection vulnerability in Mitel SIP phones. [...]

item.title: Solana Pump.fun tool DogWifTool compromised to drain wallets
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: DogWifTools has disclosed on its official Discord channel that its software has been compromised by a supply chain attack that impacted its Windows client, infecting users with malware. [...]
